header_text: You recently received a medical bill that was more than you were expecting. You will have to take a significant amount of money out of your savings account to pay for it. You worry about not having a lot of money left in your savings account after you pay for this bill.

elements.text: You feel grateful that you've saved up money for an emergency like this, and you know that you'll be able to rebuild your savings account...
